component.name: A
component.description: Creates an anchor (or link) that offers custom configuration and localization.

attribute.description: Sets a role for assistive technologies to interpret HTML elements that have been used for something other than their intended purpose. For example, the <p> tag could be used for something other than a paragraph.
attribute.name: ariaRole

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets the URL navigated to when the link is clicked.
attribute.name: href

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the text value for the anchor's label.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets the language of the anchor component, to assist search engines and web browsers in finding and rendering the anchor appropriately.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

attribute.description: Sets a JavaScript function to be called on a user clicking the anchor.
attribute.name: onClick

attribute.description: Sets the target window in which the URL is opened. The default value is self. Possible values are blank, self, parent, top, and a unique frame's name.
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: Sets the anchor's title.
attribute.name: title

component.name: Button
component.description: Creates a fully configurable button that offers portlet namespacing and custom icons.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component. These styles override the ones set by the primary attribute.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets whether the component is disabled. The default value is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Sets the URL navigated to when the button is clicked.
attribute.name: href

attribute.description: Sets the icon to display on the button based on the icon CSS class value given. Possible CSS class values can be found at here.
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Sets the alignment for the button's icon. The default value is left.
attribute.name: iconAlign

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the button's name.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Sets a function to be called on a user clicking the button.
attribute.name: onClick

attribute.description: Sets whether to apply the primary btn CSS styling to the button. If the type attribute is set to submit, this value is set to true. For all other types, the value is set to false.
attribute.name: primary

attribute.description: Sets the button's type. Possible values are button, submit, cancel and reset. the default value is button.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Sets whether to open a dialog window with the href location when a user clicks the button. The default value is false.
attribute.name: useDialog

attribute.description: Sets whether to use the default portlet namespace, to avoid name conflicts. The default value is true.
attribute.name: useNamespace

attribute.description: Sets the text to display on the button.
attribute.name: value

component.name: ButtonRow
component.description: Creates a button row <div> tag to wrap <aui:button> components and offer additional styling.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

component.name: Col
component.description: Creates a column for an <aui:row> component.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the width of the column in the containing row as a fraction of <code>12<code>. For example, a span of <code>4<code> specifies a column width of <code>4/12<code> (or <code>1/3)<code> of the total width of the containing row.
attribute.name: span

attribute.description: Sets the width of the column in the containing row as a percentage, overriding the span attribute. The width is then converted to a span expressed as (width/100) x 12, rounded to the nearest whole number. For example, a width of 33 is converted to 3.96, which is rounded up to a span value of 4.
attribute.name: width

component.name: Column
component.description: Deprecated as of 6.2, replaced by aui:col.

attribute.description: Sets the width of the column in percentage. For example, 20 would be 20%. The default value is 0.
attribute.name: columnWidth

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Sets whether the column should be the first column. The default value is false.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets whether the column is the last column. The default value is false.
attribute.name: last

component.name: Container
component.description: Creates a container <div> tag to wrap <aui:row> components and offer additional styling.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Sets whether the container's size is fixed or is able to span the entire width of the viewport. The default value is true.
attribute.name: fluid

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

component.name: FieldWrapper
component.description: Creates a <div> tag to wrap form fields and offer additional styling.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets whether the wrapper should be the first element of the form. The default value is false.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: Sets text to display as a help tooltip on mouse over of the component's help icon.
attribute.name: helpMessage

attribute.description: Sets whether to make this field inline with the next element. The default value is false.
attribute.name: inlineField

attribute.description: Aligns the label's text. Possible values are right and left.
attribute.name: inlineLabel

attribute.description: Sets the text value for the wrapper's label.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets whether the wrapper should be the last element of the form. The default value is false.
attribute.name: last

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

attribute.description: Sets the field wrapper's name.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Sets whether to mark the wrapped fields as required.
attribute.name: required

component.name: Fieldset
component.description: Creates a <div> tag to group related form elements and offer additional styling.

attribute.description: Sets whether to display the field set as a column instead of a row.
attribute.name: column

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Sets text to display as a help tooltip on mouse over of the component's help icon.
attribute.name: helpMessage

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the text value for the field set's label and renders it as a legend, with a horizontal rule, above the fieldset.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

component.name: Form
component.description: Creates a form that offers additional styling and custom namespacing.

attribute.description: Sets where to send the form data when the form is submitted.
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Sets whether to escape the XML of the form's action URL. The default value is true.
attribute.name: escapeXml

attribute.description: Sets whether to align the form's labels. The default value is false.
attribute.name: inlineLabels

attribute.description: Sets how to send the form data. The default value is post. Possible values are get and post.
attribute.name: method

attribute.description: Sets the form's name and ID. The default value is fm.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Sets a function to be called on submitting the form.
attribute.name: onSubmit

attribute.description: Sets a namespace for the form and its elements. This attribute lets you set a namespace value that differs from the default portlet namespace.
attribute.name: portletNamespace

attribute.description: Sets whether to use the default portlet namespace, to avoid name conflicts. The default value is true.
attribute.name: useNamespace

component.name: Icon
component.description: Creates a customizable icon that gives access to Bootstrap CSS icons.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component. Values are taken from the Bootstrap CSS icon classes, such as icon-edit. This attribute does not override the image attribute.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the image to display for the icon. Values are taken from the suffix of the Bootstrap icon CSS classes. For example, to display the edit icon you would reference the icon-edit CSS class by setting the value edit.
attribute.name: image

attribute.description: Sets the text to display on the right side of the icon.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets the target window in which the URL is opened. The default value is self. Possible values are blank, self, parent, top, and a unique frame's name.
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: Sets the URL navigated to when the icon is clicked.
attribute.name: url

component.name: Input
component.description: Creates a configurable input field component.

attribute.description: Sets whether the input component gets focus by default.
attribute.name: autoFocus

attribute.description: Sets whether the input component autosizes.
attribute.name: autoSize

attribute.description: Sets the bean associated with the input component.
attribute.name: bean

attribute.description: Sets whether to reload the page when the value of the field changes. The default value is false.
attribute.name: changesContext

attributes.attribute: Sets Whether the input is selected. Note that this attribute is only enabled when type=radio or type=checkbox.. checked boolean boolean

attribute.description: Sets the primary key for the instance of the class. The default value is 0.
attribute.name: classPK

attribute.description: Sets the primary key for the class type. The default value is -1.
attribute.name: classTypePK

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets the default language ID for the component.
attribute.name: defaultLanguageId

attribute.description: Sets whether the component is disabled. The default value is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Sets a variable name to refer to the field of the component.
attribute.name: fieldParam

attribute.description: Sets whether the input should be the first element of the form.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: Sets the name of the input's form.
attribute.name: formName

attribute.description: Sets text to display as a help tooltip on mouse over of the component's help icon.
attribute.name: helpMessage

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling the help message text. The default value is input-group-addon.
attribute.name: helpTextCssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets whether to ignore the value saved from the request object. The default value is false.
attribute.name: ignoreRequestValue

attribute.description: Sets whether to align the select field with the next element in the form. The default value is false.
attribute.name: inlineField

attribute.description: Aligns the label's text. Possible values are right and left.
attribute.name: inlineLabel

attribute.description: Sets the label for the input component. If not assigned a value, the label is automatically taken from the name attribute's value.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

attribute.description: Sets whether the input should be the last element of the form.
attribute.name: last

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the field into the user's language. The default value is false.
attribute.name: localized

attribute.description: Sets the max value for type number and range input fields. Note that the max value is inclusive.
attribute.name: max

attribute.description: Sets the class for the bean object.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: Sets the min value for type number and range input fields. Note that the min value is inclusive.
attribute.name: min

attribute.description: Sets the input's name.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Sets a function to be called when the input field's value changes.
attribute.name: onChange

attribute.description: Sets a function to be called on a user clicking the input field.
attribute.name: onClick

attribute.description: Sets placeholder text for the input field.
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: Sets text to display at the left side of the input field.
attribute.name: prefix

attribute.description: Sets whether to mark the input field as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Sets whether the input field is resizeable, if it is of type textarea.
attribute.name: resizable

attribute.description: Sets whether to show the required label's text next to the input field, if an input field value is required.
attribute.name: showRequiredLabel

attribute.description: Sets text to display at the right side of the input field.
attribute.name: suffix

attribute.description: Sets the input field's title.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Sets the input field's type. Possible values are text, hidden, assetCategories, assetTags, textarea, timeZone, password, checkbox, radio, submit, button, color, email, number, range, resource, url, and an empty value. If an empty value or no value is set, the input's type will be automatically obtained from the bean.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Sets whether to use the default portlet namespace, to avoid name conflicts. The default value is true.
attribute.name: useNamespace

attribute.description: Sets the input field's value.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Sets whether to wrap the input field in a div that can be styled. The default value is false. If the wrapperCssClass attribute is configured, the value is automatically set to true.
attribute.name: wrappedField

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling the div that wraps the input field.
attribute.name: wrapperCssClass

component.name: Layout
component.description: Deprecated as of 6.2, with no replacement.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

component.name: ModelContext
component.description: Creates a configurable model object that can be used as the model for other components.

attribute.description: Sets the bean associated with the model object.
attribute.name: bean

attribute.description: Sets the default language ID for the component.
attribute.name: defaultLanguageId

attribute.description: Sets the class for the bean object.
attribute.name: model

component.name: Nav
component.description: Creates a navigation menu wrapper to hold <nav:item> components.

attribute.description: Sets a name for the navigation item for assistive technologies to interpret.
attribute.name: ariaLabel

attribute.description: Sets a role for assistive technologies to interpret HTML elements that have been used for something other than their intended purpose. For example, the <p> tag could be used for something other than a paragraph.
attribute.name: ariaRole

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the search container for the navigation to use.
attribute.name: searchContainer

attribute.description: Sets whether to use the default portlet namespace, to avoid name conflicts. The default value is true.
attribute.name: useNamespace

component.name: NavBar
component.description: Creates a navigation menu bar to house navigation menu items.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

component.name: NavBarSearch
component.description: Creates a search bar for a navigation menu bar.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the search container for the navigation bar to use.
attribute.name: searchContainer

component.name: NavItem
component.description: Creates a navigation menu item for a navigation menu.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling the link set in the href attribute.
attribute.name: anchorCssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes for the anchor. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: anchorData

attribute.description: Identifies the instance of the navigation item's link set in the href attribute.
attribute.name: anchorId

attribute.description: Sets a name for the navigation item for assistive technologies to interpret.
attribute.name: ariaLabel

attribute.description: Sets a role for assistive technologies to interpret HTML elements that have been used for something other than their intended purpose. For example, the <p> tag could be used for something other than a paragraph.
attribute.name: ariaRole

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets whether the navigation item is a dropdown menu. The default value is false.
attribute.name: dropdown

attribute.description: Sets the URL navigated to when the navigation item is clicked.
attribute.name: href

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling the navigation item icon.
attribute.name: iconCssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the text to display for the navigation item.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

attribute.description: Sets whether the navigation item is selected by default. The default value is false.
attribute.name: selected

attribute.description: Sets the navigation item's title.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Sets whether to open a dialog window with the href location when a user clicks the navigation item. The default value is false.
attribute.name: useDialog

attribute.description: Sets whether to wrap the dropdown menu in an unordered list with the drop-down-menu class. The default value is true.
attribute.name: wrapDropDownMenu

component.name: Option
component.description: Creates an option for an <aui:select> component.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", foo> would render as the attribute data-class-name = foo;.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets whether the component is disabled. The default value is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Sets the text to display as the option in the select form.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

attribute.description: Sets whether the option is selected when the component loads. The default value is false.
attribute.name: selected

attribute.description: Sets the styling for the option component. For example, to align the text to the right you would specify text-align:right;.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Sets the option's value. If no value is given, the value is taken from the label attribute.
attribute.name: value

component.name: Row
component.description: Creates a row container to display content.

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

component.name: Script
component.description: Creates a script component in which to write JavaScript.

attribute.description: Sets the script's position.
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: Sets the AlloyUI packages to be used in the script, separated by a comma.
attribute.name: use

component.name: Select
component.description: Creates a select field (or combo box) that holds <aui:option> components.

attribute.description: Sets the bean associated with the select component.
attribute.name: bean

attribute.description: Sets whether to reload the page when the value of the field changes. The default value is false.
attribute.name: changesContext

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling this component.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Takes a set of data and passes it as HTML data attributes. For example, the HashMap <"class-name", "foo"> would render as the attribute data-class-name = "foo";.
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Sets whether the component is disabled. The default value is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Sets whether the select field should be the first element of the form. The default value is false.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: Sets text to display as a help tooltip on mouse over of the component's help icon.
attribute.name: helpMessage

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets whether to align the select field with the next element in the form. The default value is false.
attribute.name: inlineField

attribute.description: Aligns the label's text. Possible values are right and left.
attribute.name: inlineLabel

attribute.description: Sets the select field's label and displays it above the field.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Sets whether the select field should be the last element in the form. The default value is false.
attribute.name: last

attribute.description: Sets the list type and automatically generates the options. Possible values can be found in ListTypeImpl.java.
attribute.name: listType

attribute.description: Sets whether to translate the label's text into the user's language. The default value is true.
attribute.name: localizeLabel

attribute.description: Sets whether multiple options can be selected. If set to true, the select field expands to allow for multiple selections. The default value is false.
attribute.name: multiple

attribute.description: Sets the select field's name attribute. Note that this value overrides the label attribute and takes the place of the label.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Sets a function to be called when the select field's value changes.
attribute.name: onChange

attribute.description: Sets a function to be called on users clicking the select field.
attribute.name: onClick

attribute.description: Sets the text to display to the left of the select field.
attribute.name: prefix

attribute.description: Sets whether to mark the select field as required. The default value is false.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Sets whether to display an empty option as a placeholder. The default value is false.
attribute.name: showEmptyOption

attribute.description: Sets whether to display the required label above the select field. Note that this attribute is only active if the required attribute is set to true. The default value is false.
attribute.name: showRequiredLabel

attribute.description: Sets the text to display to the right of the select field.
attribute.name: suffix

attribute.description: Sets the select field's title.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Sets whether to use the default portlet namespace, to avoid name conflicts. The default value is true.
attribute.name: useNamespace

attribute.description: Sets a CSS class for styling the div that wraps the select field.
attribute.name: wrapperCssClass

component.name: Spacer
component.description: Creates a spacer component that enables JSP 2.1 server side trimming of white spaces.

component.name: TranslationManager
component.description: Creates a ui that manages the available translations to the user.

attribute.description: Sets the available languages to choose from for translation.
attribute.name: availableLocales

attribute.description: Sets the language Id that the translation manager will default to when no other translations are available in the user's language.
attribute.name: defaultLanguageId

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets whether to activate the translation manager. The default value is true. If this is set to false, the translation manager will not work entirely.
attribute.name: initialize

attribute.description: Sets whether to make the translation manager read-only for the user. The default value is false.
attribute.name: readOnly

component.name: Validator
component.description: Creates a component to validate input fields.

attribute.description: Sets a custom error message that replaces the default error message for validation.
attribute.name: errorMessage

attribute.description: Sets the type of validation for the input field. Possible values are acceptFiles, alpha, alphanum, date, digits, email, equalTo, iri, max, maxLength, min, minLength, number, required, and url.
attribute.name: name

component.name: WorkflowStatus
component.description: Creates a ui that displays the current status in the workflow.

attribute.description: Sets the bean associated with the workflow status component.
attribute.name: bean

attribute.description: Sets text to display as a help tooltip on mouse over of the component's help icon.
attribute.name: helpMessage

attribute.description: Identifies the component instance.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Sets the class for the bean object.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: Sets whether to show the workflow status icon. The default value is true.
attribute.name: showIcon

attribute.description: Sets whether to show the status label. The default value is true.
attribute.name: showLabel

attribute.description: Sets the workflow status. Possible values are 0(Approved), 1(Pending), 2(Draft), 3(Expired), 4(Denied), 5(Inactive), 6(Incomplete), 7(Scheduled), and 8(In-Trash). Any other value defaults to status Any.
attribute.name: status

attribute.description: Sets the status message and overrides the existing one.
attribute.name: statusMessage

attribute.description: Sets the version for the workflow status and displays it with a label next to the status.
attribute.name: version
